info.name: Swagbucks + Yahoo Search: Dark (Nova)
info.description: A dark, cleaned up theme for Swagbucks and Yahoo Search (where Swagbucks pulls their results from). It's not perfect, but it's functional. [Note: This is NOT a complete Yahoo style, it only covers the parts that show on Swagbaucks!]
info.additionalInfo: 160827 - I've updated things a little bit, but I'm still working to make sure everything has been updated properly. If you find something that isn't quite right, please leave me a comment here! Thanks!
